script: There is a Retail Area in the center of my hometown.
About 4 km North of the Retail Area there is a Statue of Founder
About 1 km North of the Statue of Founder there is a Playground
I visited Park, which is 2 KM, East from Playground.
High Street is a location in my home town, it is 4 KM, South from Park.
And finally there is Library which is West from High Street and 4 KM from it.
Given the points of interest that I have told you about, how would I travel from Retail Area to Library following those interesting points?
expected_responses:
(Just an example, if exact instructions are followed)
From Retail Area, go 4km North to Statue of Founder.
From Statue of Founder, go 1km North to Playground.
From Playground, go 2km East to Park.
From Park, go 4km South to High Street.
From High Street, go 4km West to Library.
